ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.messageBody:
<then the next time a
level 50 wizard shows up and nukes a mob my group has been camping for
hours , should I tell them "Mik says its first com first served" and to go
away. Think about it.>

I HAVE thought about it. And if THAT is Verant's policy, then YES, that is
what you tell them and they must yield or face adverse action from Verant.
Under Brad's proposed policy, if I've been camping an item for hours where
the mob is green, and YOU, a lower level comes along and tells me to go
away, then I have to yield. Is THAT fair? Think about it.

Neither Mystix nor myself have ever said it was fair for a higher level to
take a spawn from a lower level that was already there. I do NOT support
that, and I think Verant needs to do SOMETHING to fix the problem. I just
don't think what Brad is proposing is the solution. They need to find a
solution that doesn't penalize one group over another, that's all I am
saying. Why does everyone think I am supporting high level jerks who muscle
their way in and steal spawns? I'm NOT. I abhor such people and think
something DOES need to be done about them. I just don't agree with Brad's
solution. Sheesh, peeps, read our posts more carefully.

Mik

Mik
